page.title: 06YOUTH RECREATION EASTFIELD
page.content: There are various clubs and activities for children in and around Eastfield. Boxing,judo or gymnastics are favourite pastimes for some children, while others enjoy music or dance classes. There are cub, scout, guide and brownie packs which offer outdoor as well as indoor activities. Braeburn School has a swimming pool which is not only used by the children in school time but also by clubs and organisations in the evenings. Eastfield County Youth Centre which is based at Pindar School holds several youth clubs during the week. These cater for children from ten to seventeen and provide pool, snooker, table tennis, rounders, video games and football as well as drama and art groups. Trips are also arranged for members throughout the year.
